The Frog That Wished to be a Prince:     A young prince, enchanted by the magical world of amphibians, discovers a mysterious frog that can transform into a prince. The prince is thrilled to finally find a way to become a frog, but with a twist: he can only transform back into a prince on a specific day of the year, tied to the lunar cycle. As he navigates this new reality, he must confront the complexities of identity, belonging, and the true meaning of being a prince.

The Secret Garden of Lost Memories:     In a world where memories can be extracted and stored in a mystical garden, a young gardener named Luna discovers a hidden path that leads to a secret garden filled with lost memories. As she tends to the garden, she uncovers the stories of those who have lost their memories, and in doing so, she begins to unravel the mysteries of her own past. With the help of a mischievous garden spirit, Luna must navigate the blurred lines between reality and fantasy to reclaim her own memories and restore the garden to its former glory.

The Time Traveler's Dilemma:     When a brilliant physicist discovers a way to communicate with her past self, she is faced with a series of impossible choices that threaten to destroy the fabric of time. As she navigates the consequences of her decisions, she must confront the consequences of playing with time and the true cost of altering the course of history. With the help of a mysterious ally from the future, she must find a way to repair the timeline and prevent a catastrophic future.

The Last Dreamweaver:     In a world where dreams are a shared experience, a young Dreamweaver named Aria discovers that she is the last of her kind. With the ability to shape and manipulate the dreams of others, Aria must navigate the surreal landscape of the subconscious to uncover the secrets of her craft and the reason behind her people's disappearance. As she delves deeper into the mysteries of the dreamworld, she must confront the darkness that threatens to consume the dreams of others and the world itself.

The Memory Eater:     In a world where memories can be consumed and manipulated, a young Memory Eater named Kael discovers that he has the ability to absorb and relive the memories of others.
